name: Endless Defence
description:
This is the game for a School Graduation Project , I can't wait for you to try it out. I’m thrilled to announce that it will also be available on Android, so you can play it on the go. Get ready for intense, immersive gameplay and endless hours of zombie-slaying fun.

It's not over!

But this game isn't just a one-and-done experience - I'll be regularly releasing updates to keep the action fresh and exciting. This means you can look forward to new weapons, new levels, and even new game modes as you continue to battle against the zombie horde.

Check out my first Android Game: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.KubalaGames.SchoolPhobia
